name: USAGI (Mishatventures)
description:
This is a twine-based game about YOU and your interactions with two bunny people. There is an official ending and you can adjust the volume to the music with the side bar.  All art and story are original and created by me. 

The background track is "chocolate" produced by Lukrembo. It is copyright-free and available for commercial use. 

This is the first game I've ever created with twine and 0 knowledge about programming. I made this in a span of a week to play around with mechanics so it's pretty basic in concept but I hope you enjoy it nevertheless. Feel free to donate if you like it and fuel my motivation to make more games.

If you want to follow me, check out my twitter @Mishatventures!
